attributes.review: The app took an extremely long time to download and when it did it functioned like a 1st grader made it. You’d think the official Donald Trump app would function decently but no. The app is terrible.
attributes.title: GARBAGE APP

attributes.review: This app took up so much storage space, super slow to open, and is just absolute GARBAGE. Seriously, this app DRAINED my battery, and it never even opened. I am DISGUSTED. I am REVOLTED. I dedicate my ENTIRE LIFE to our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ, and THIS??? Is the thanks I get???
attributes.title: THE ABSOLUTE WORST

attributes.review: this took 89 hours🕑 to download!!! 😖and once it was done my phone📱started glitching like crazy!! 😾 if i could rate this 0 stars ✨ i would!!🤧 not recommend 👎✨🧚💔
attributes.title: HORRIBLE ✨😾

attributes.review: Can’t believe I wasted space on my phone for this. Not useful in the slightest and needs lots of improvement!
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: The day I downloaded this app my cat died, my grandpa got sick with the corona virus, and my sister got laid off from her job. This app brings nothing but bad luck to those who download it and use it. DONT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE I DID !!!
attributes.title: BAD LUCK

attributes.review: I downloaded this app but it’s all fake news, I absolutely love trump but after all the ads, glitches, and sudden freezing I unfortunately will not vote for him in the 2020 election
attributes.title: HORRIFIC🧚🏼💫

attributes.review: The app mined all my data in the 5 minutes I spent signing up and the home page is just flat out aggregious! LOST MY VOTE
attributes.title: Worst app experience I’ve had since flappy bird

attributes.review: This app hacked my phone and then they came to my house after I complained and they threw my baby into my window while bombing my house.
attributes.title: They killed my baby

attributes.review: It took forever to download. It also takes force to start up. Just super slow. And I GOT HACKED after I downloaded this. It’s full of bugs and viruses. Don’t get it. Learn form my mistakes.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Trump is just racist, also I downloaded the app, but I need a phone number to use it? I don’t have a phone number so I can’t even use the app.
attributes.title: Racist
